data.title: Latest News of Sydney Pollack
data.meta_description: Sydney Pollack News: Check out the latest news about Sydney Pollack along with Sydney Pollack movies, Sydney Pollack photos, Sydney Pollack videos and more on Times of India Entertainment.
data.text:
'The Exorcist' cinematographer Owen Roizman passes away at 86

IANS / Jan 08, 2023, 15:58 (IST)

Cinematographer Owen Roizman, who shot many premier films of a generation like 'The French Connection' and 'The Exorcist', has died at the age of 86.

'Carry On' and 'Harry Potter' star Leslie Phillips passes away at 98

ANI / Nov 09, 2022, 14:30 (IST)

British actor Leslie Phillips, who is known for his roles in films like 'Harry Potter' and 'Carry On' passed away at 98 following a long illness.

Streep faked assets to bag roles?

Feb 26, 2009, 11:10 (IST)

Double Oscar-award winning actress Meryl Streep has revealed that she used to pad up her brassiere in a bid to land film roles.

From 'Roman Holiday' to 'The Darjeeling Limited': Most memorable travel-themed films

TNN / Sep 27, 2015, 16:48 (IST)

Itâ€™s quite magical how films, more than any other piece of pop-culture ephemera, have the power to sweep you away on a Mediterranean cruise, walk you into the lap of the Alps or whisk you through a musty flea market in Asia.

Best Entertainment

TNN / Dec 11, 2275, 10:33 (IST)

Max Ka Jadoo: Throughout the month of August there will be a contest that gives viewers an opportunity to win gold instantly. Abhisekh Bachchan, Kirti Reddy, Vashu Bhagnani and Ikram Akhtar - all connected with the movie, Tera Jadoo Chal Gaya will ask the viewers questions related to the film. One simple question and you could be the lucky winner to take away 100 gms of gold. It will be on throughout the weekend at 7:45 pm on SonyMax.
